parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF11240003) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance reporting and are mandated for candidates.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Sebastian Tiberiu Pop as a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies from the PNCR (Partidul Național Conservator Român).  This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's primary objective is to promote Sebastian Tiberiu Pop's candidacy. It encourages listeners to hear his podcast, implicitly urging them to vote for him.  The inclusion of the CMF number further reinforces this electoral objective. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>While the post mentions a podcast, the content itself is promotional in nature, not journalistic. It lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The focus is on promoting the candidate and his views, not providing balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured campaign message promoting a candidate and his party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1522939945077241</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, Art 36 (7). It refers directly to a candidate (Sebastian Tiberiu Pop), is used during the electoral campaign period (as indicated by the CMF number and the reference to the December 1st election), has a clear electoral objective (promoting the candidate), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The paid Facebook post format ensures it targets a wide audience.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  The presence of the CMF number is a strong indicator of intentional electoral campaigning.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Sebastian Tiberiu Pop</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNCR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Responsabilul campaniei electorale], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1522939945077241) cu scop electoral, care promovează candidatura lui Sebastian Tiberiu Pop pentru Camera Deputaților din partea PNCR, inclusiv prin prezentarea unui podcast electoral și utilizarea codului CMF11240003, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului menționat. Postarea, fiind plătită și distribuită pe o platformă publică, se adresează unui public larg și depășește limitele activității jurnalistice obiective.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
